title: Wild & Stone | Organic Children's Bamboo Toothbrush | 4 Pack | Soft Fibre Bristles | 100% Biodegradable Handle | BPA Free | Vegan Eco Friendly Kids Toothbrushes (Multicolour)
features: ❇️ 100% RECYCLED PACKAGING: Our 4-pack of children's bamboo toothbrushes each box contains 4 individual toothbrushes complete with rainbow colours Yellow, Blue, Purple and Green so that your children get to pick their favourite. A fantastic plastic free alternative to encourage brushing allowing your children to select their favourite colour. Our toothbrushes are packed in 100% recycled cardboard
❇️ ORGANIC BAMBOO - Each kids toothbrush is made from a single piece of naturally sustainable bamboo, as such no glue needed. Bamboo is naturally water resistant

❇️ ERGONOMIC DESIGN - The flat style handle has been designed for maximum comfort during regular daily use. By buying our Bamboo Toothbrush you are one simple step closer to contributing to the reduction of billions of disposable toothbrushes discarded to landfill or end up in our seas and oceans

❇️ SOFT BRISTLES - highest quality BPA Free nylon bristles, no nasties, head shape recommended by dentists. The nylon used in our biodegradable toothbrushes' bristles is completely BPA-free and feels incredibly soft against your teeth and gums to help clear away food debris and give your teeth the perfect polish

❇️ MAKE BRUSHING FUN. Our toothbrushes will make the time to brush your children's teeth even more fun! These are perfect for little mouths and have soft bristles. If you care about oral hygiene and environmental safety together, swap your plastic-based toothbrush for a sustainably grown Kids Bamboo Toothbrush.
description: Product Description Easy to adopt, usable and stylish alternatives to single use plastic At Wild & Stone, we promise to do our best to provide you with products that you'll love. Our products are always: Sustainable - All our products are sourced and created consciously, creating minimal social and environmental impact on their journey from raw materials to consumers. Fairly Priced - Our products have prices that reflect responsible sourcing and the use of high-quality materials. We strive to give you the best product possible. Beautifully Designed - We put time and care into creating beautiful products that will compliment your lifestyle and your home. Our products are bespoke and have been adapted over time based on testing and customer feedback. Customer Focused - We have over 200,000 happy customers and offer a 30 day happiness promise. We'll rectify any problems as soon as possible. Giving Back - We proudly support the Marine Conservation Society. We donate a percentage of every sale to help ensure our seas are healthy, pollution free and protected. Toothbrushes for all the Family A choice of toothbrushes for the whole family. Our bamboo toothbrushes come in a variety of sizes, firmness and colour. Sustainably Made Our toothbrushes are consciously made from sustainably Harvested FSC Certified MOSO Bamboo. Panda Friendly MOSO bamboo is not eaten by Pandas and therefore does not endanger the animal. Toxin Free We've sourced the highest quality 6 filament bristles from DuPont and only ever use water based paint which is completely toxin free. Recyclable Packaging We're proud of our plastic free, recyclable kraft packaging with toxin free vegetable dyes. Simply place the box with your usual household recycling. Lots of Fun Colours Our toothbrushes come in a range of colours to make brushing your teeth that little bit more fun. Help Us Make A Change Today, more than 5 trillion pieces of plastic are floating in our oceans. It is predicated that by 2050 there will be more plastic in our oceans than fish.
